response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth to you is $10,000. Considering this, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price of $9,000. This represents a substantial saving and a unique opportunity for you to acquire something truly special. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 9000}
